I

isBlack - Variable in class chess.Block
color of the block is given by boolean isBlack
iscastlingmove - Static variable in class pieces.King
 
isOpponentKingInCheck(int, int) - Static method in class pieces.King
static method isOpponentKingInCheck(int newRow, int newCol) this is checked after the move to a new position has already been made returns true if the move made by any of the current players pieces places the opponent player's king in check
isOpponentKinginCheckmate(int, int) - Static method in class pieces.King
static method isOpponentKinginCheckmate(int newRow, int newCol) Checks if the current move will put opponent's king in a checkmate position, returns true if it does
isPlayerKingInCheck(int, int, int, int) - Static method in class pieces.King
static method isPlayerKingInCheck(int oldRow, int oldCol, int newRow, int newCol) this is checked before a move is made returns true if the move to be made to a new position by any of the current players pieces will place the current player's own king in check
isSquareBlack() - Method in class chess.Block
isSquareBlack() Checks if the block is black or not
isValidMove(int, int, int, int) - Method in class pieces.Bishop
isValidMove(int oldCol, int oldRow, int newCol, int newRow) checks to see if a move is valid from old position to new position for a Bishop piece
isValidMove(int, int, int, int) - Method in class pieces.King
isValidMove(int oldCol, int oldRow, int newCol, int newRow) checks to see if a move is valid from old position to new position for a King piece

isValidMove(int oldCol, int oldRow, int newCol, int newRow) checks to see if a move is valid from old position to new position for a Knight piece
isValidMove(int, int, int, int) - Method in class pieces.Pawn
isValidMove(int oldCol, int oldRow, int newCol, int newRow) checks to see if a move is valid from old position to new position for a Pawn piece
isValidMove(int, int, int, int) - Method in class pieces.Pieces
isValidMove abstract method checks to see if move is valid from old position to new position
isValidMove(int, int, int, int) - Method in class pieces.Queen
isValidMove(int oldCol, int oldRow, int newCol, int newRow) checks to see if a move is valid from old position to new position for a Queen piece
isValidMove(int, int, int, int) - Method in class pieces.Rook
isValidMove(int oldCol, int oldRow, int newCol, int newRow) checks to see if a move is valid from old position to new position for a Rook piece
isWhite - Variable in class pieces.Pieces
isWhite boolean is true if piece is white, false if piece is black
isWhite() - Method in class pieces.Pieces
isWhite() Checks to see whether a piece is white, returns true if white, false if black
